answers.answer: Hi,The following medical conditions are some of the possible causes of Leg burning sensation- Diabetes , Peripheral artery disease, Peripheral Neuropathy, Claudication painHeat burn , Peripheral nerve trauma, Peripheral nerve compression, Sciatica, Cerebrovascular accident, Herpes zoster, Chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy, HIV , Lead poisoning , Chronic renal failure , Alcoholism , Syphilis, SLE , Amyloidosis , Sarcoidosis and Multiple sclerosis. Please go for MRI of the spine, brain, legs and a full body scan. Please consult a neurologist and physician to find out the cause. Hope this helps you. Take care and regards!
